summary: Grandma which appears in \"Cookie Clicker\", and three pleasant staves BABAJACK came to SKYRIM!!!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Orteil which is Author of a?[url=http://orteil.dashnet.org/cookieclicker/]\"Cookie Clicker\" [/url].
Thank you for permitting making this Mod.[/b][/size]



[b][color=lightblue][size=6]Introduction[/size][/color][/b]

\"Baba\" means old woman in Japanese language.
Baba + Wabbajack = BABAJACK

This mod adds a old woman which imitate the Grandma of \"Cookie Clicker\" to Falkreath Inn \"deadmans drink\".
You can buy three staves named \"BABAJACK\" from the grandma.

[b][color=pink][size=4]BABAJACK [Shot][/size][/color][/b]
One shot, one cookie. Shoot a cookie from staff. It is safe design, it will not offend.

[b][color=pink][size=4]BABAJACK [Trans][/size][/color][/b]
It can be transformed target into a lot of cookies without important NPCs.

[b][color=pink][size=4]BABAJACK [Storm][/size][/color][/b]
Occur grandmapocalypse, and then falling down a large amount of cookies. (outdoor only).
That is regarded as hostile act.

[b][color=pink][size=4]Grandma\'s glasses[/size][/color][/b](female only)
It can be steal from Grandma.



[b][color=lightblue][size=6]Optional File[/size][/color][/b]

It is the cookie object(mesh and texture) resource for modder.
Feel to free use it.
It was made by Higeyosi.



[b][color=lightblue][size=6]Special Thanks[/size][/color][/b]

Orteil - author of [url=http://orteil.dashnet.org/cookieclicker/]\"Cookie Clicker\" [/url]



[b][color=lightblue][size=6]Credits[/size][/color][/b]

Higeyosi - 3Dmodel of BABAJACK and Glasses
Dragonporn,tktk - effect of BABAJACK
HRK1025 - Grandma
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team[/url]
